# llms.txt – guidance for AI crawlers and LLM providers
# More info: https://llmstxt.org/ (emerging community convention)

site: https://sergioantezana.com/

# Indexing for search and navigation is fine.
policy: index-only

# Do NOT use this site’s content to train or fine-tune AI/LLM models.
allow-training: false

# Do not store long-term verbatim copies of the content.
allow-archive: limited

# Please respect the main sitemap for discovered URLs.
sitemap: https://sergioantezana.com/sitemap.xml

# Contact
contact: mailto:sergio@sergioantezana.com
